reason_learn_from_us.2: Designed specifically for beginners, our materials are presented simply and structured, helping you start your programming learning journey with confidence, even without prior experience.
reason_learn_from_us.3: We believe that the best learning process is achieved when materials are presented clearly and are easy to digest.
motivational_quotes: Empowering everyone to become a programming expert from the basics.

profile_bio: not a perfect person, just someone who keeps learning and trying, because he believes that big dreams are born from a long and consistent process.
about_us.content.introduction.1: Welcome to NganggurDev - a learning hub for anyone who wants to use their free time to learn programming, whether they are beginners or already skilled in the field. We believe that everyone can learn programming languages regardless of their educational background or prior experience, and that is why we have designed content that is beginner-friendly, easy to understand, and systematically structured from the basics to advanced levels.
about_us.content.introduction.2: The name NganggurDev comes from the word 'nganggur' (Indonesian) which means someone who is unemployed, and 'dev' which is short for developer. The reason for choosing this phrase is the reality of what is happening in today's era, where many developers, especially website developers, find it very difficult to find jobs that match their field. However, as the CEO & Founder of NganggurDev, I don't want to give up. In fact, from this condition, I am encouraged to continue to create through the materials or articles that I make, so that they can be useful for anyone who wants to learn and develop in the world of programming.
about_us.what_we_offer.title: What we offer:
about_us.what_we_offer.list.1: Free programming articles and tutorials that can be accessed anytime.
about_us.what_we_offer.list.2: Multi-language support (EN | ID) so we can choose the language that is most comfortable for learning.
about_us.what_we_offer.list.3: Step-by-step guide complete with clear code examples and simple explanations.
about_us.what_we_offer.list.4: A series of tutorials on creating simple to complex projects using frameworks and non-frameworks.
about_us.content.closing: Our goal is to help more people discover their potential in the digital world, provide knowledge, and inspire them to continue learning..
about_us.content.criticism_and_suggestio: We greatly appreciate any constructive feedback to improve the quality of content and learning experience at NganggurDev. Every suggestion you provide is very meaningful to us in order to continue improving the material we present. Please feel free to contact us via email below:
about_us.close.title: Closing
about_us.close.description: Thank you for visiting NganggurDev. We hope that all the material we present will be useful, inspiring, and a first step for us to continue to grow in the world of programming.
privacy_policy.content:
This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information when you visit our website, which provides tutorial articles on programming languages. Our site supports multiple languages, including English (EN) and Indonesian (ID). We are committed to protecting your privacy and complying with applicable data protection laws. This policy is effective as of August 11, 2025. By using our website, you agree to the terms outlined in this Privacy Policy.

Information We Collect

We may collect the following types of information:

  • Non-Personal Information: Data collected automatically, such as IP address, browser type, device information, pages visited, time spent on pages, and referral sources. This is collected through cookies, web beacons, and similar technologies.

  • Usage Data: Interactions with our content, such as search queries or article views, to improve user experience.

We use Google Analytics and similar tools to track site usage, but we do not collect data that personally identifies you without your consent.

How We Use Your Information

  • To provide and improve our services, including personalized content in EN or ID based on your preferences.

  • For analytics purposes to understand user behavior and optimize the site.

  • To display advertisements via Google AdSense, which may use your data to serve relevant ads.

  • To comply with legal obligations or protect our rights.

Cookies and Tracking Technologies

Our website uses cookies to enhance functionality and user experience. Cookies are small files stored on your device.

  • Essential Cookies: Necessary for site operation, such as language preferences (EN/ID).

  • Analytics Cookies: From third parties like Google Analytics to monitor traffic.

  • Advertising Cookies: Google AdSense uses cookies to track your visits across sites and display personalized ads based on your interests. You can opt out of personalized ads via Google's Ads Settings or by visiting www.aboutads.info.

Third-Party Services and Advertising

Our website may use third-party services, including advertising, which may collect information about your usage. We are not responsible for their privacy practices.

Data Security

We implement reasonable security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is completely secure.

Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Changes will be posted here with the updated effective date. Continued use of the site constitutes acceptance of the revised policy.

Contact Us

If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at business.nganggurdev@gmail.com

Thank you for reading our privacy policy.
terms_of_service.content:
1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using NganggurDev ("we," "our," or "us") located at nganggurdev.com, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

2. Description of Service

NganggurDev is an educational website that provides programming tutorials, articles, and resources focused on web development technologies including but not limited to Laravel, PHP, JavaScript, and other programming languages. Our content is available in multiple languages (English and Indonesian) and is designed for educational purposes.

3. User Responsibilities

3.1 Acceptable Use

  • You may use our website for lawful purposes only

  • You agree not to use the website in any way that violates any applicable federal, state, local, or international law or regulation

  • You will not attempt to gain unauthorized access to any portion of the website

3.2 Prohibited Activities

  • Copying, distributing, or disclosing any part of the service in any medium

  • Using automated systems or software to extract data from the website

  • Attempting to interfere with, compromise the system integrity or security

  • Transmitting viruses, worms, defects, Trojan horses, or any items of a destructive nature

4. Intellectual Property Rights

4.1 Content Ownership

  • All content, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, code examples, and software, is the property of NganggurDev or its content suppliers

  • Content is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws

4.2 Limited License

  • We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to access and use our content for personal, educational, and non-commercial purposes

  • You may share links to our articles and reference our content with proper attribution

4.3 Code Examples

  • Code examples and tutorials provided are for educational purposes

  • You may use code examples in your own projects, but we are not responsible for any issues that may arise from their implementation

  • We recommend testing and adapting code examples to your specific needs

5. User-Generated Content

5.1 Comments and Contributions

  • If we enable commenting or user contributions, you retain ownership of your content

  • By submitting content, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, modify, and display your content

5.2 Content Standards

  • User content must be respectful, relevant, and appropriate

  • We reserve the right to remove any content that violates our community standards

6. Third-Party Services

6.1 External Links

  • Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services

  • We are not responsible for the content, privacy policies, or practices of third-party sites

6.2 Advertising

  • We use Google AdSense and other advertising services to display ads

  • Third-party advertisers may use cookies and similar technologies

  • We are not responsible for the content or practices of advertisers

7. Privacy and Data Protection

  • Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs your use of the website

  • We collect and use information as described in our Privacy Policy

  • By using our website, you consent to data collection and use as outlined in our Privacy Policy

8. Disclaimer of Warranties

8.1 "As Is" Basis

  • The website and all information, content, materials, products, and services included are provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis

  • We make no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied

8.2 Educational Content

  • Programming tutorials and code examples are provided for educational purposes

  • We do not guarantee that the information is complete, accurate, or up-to-date

  • Implementation of code examples is at your own risk

9. Limitation of Liability

  • In no event shall NganggurDev be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages

  • This includes but is not limited to damages for loss of profits, goodwill, use, data, or other intangible losses

  • Some jurisdictions do not allow the exclusion of certain warranties or limitations of liability, so some of the above limitations may not apply to you

10. Indemnification

You agree to indemnify and hold harmless NganggurDev from any claim or demand, including reasonable attorneys' fees, made by any third party due to or arising out of your breach of these Terms of Service, your violation of any law, or your violation of the rights of a third party.

11. Modification of Terms

  • We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time

  • Changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date

  • Your continued use of the website following the posting of changes constitutes acceptance of those changes

12. Termination

We may terminate or suspend access to our website immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms of Service.

13. Governing Law

These Terms shall be interpreted and governed by the laws of Indonesia. Any disputes relating to these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Indonesia.

14. Contact Information

If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:

  • Email: business.nganggurdev@gmail.com

  • Website: nganggurdev.com
